alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Blackfoot Mountains; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Caribou, Franklin and southwestern Bear Lake Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 329 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Preston, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Preston, Bear Lake Idaho Portion, Franklin, Saint Charles, Oneida Narrows Reservoir, Dayton, Weston, Minnetonka Cave, Mapleton, Fish Haven, Mink Creek, Whitney, and Riverdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Blackfoot Mountains; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region
